Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
National Association of

U* Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Skornia:
Many thanks for sending us a copy of nFour Years of
New York Television."
We are tremendously interested in the educational
phases of television, and appreciate the booklet
very much.
With best wishes, I am
Yours very truly.
Lester A. Schlup, Director
Division of Information Programs
